text: Thomas "Tom" Joyner (born November 23, 1949) is an American radio personality, host, philanthropist, and former musician. He is the former host of the nationally syndicated The Tom Joyner Morning Show. He is also the founder of Reach Media Inc.,, the Tom Joyner Foundation,, and BlackAmericaWeb.com. He was born in Tuskegee, Alabama, the son of Frances and Hercules L. Joyner. His grandfather Oscar was one of only 3,000 black physicians in the United States, earning a degree in medicine in 1909. Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American radio personalities
title: Tom Joyner
